title: Roasted Brussels Sprouts
introduction: Roasted Brussels sprouts are a revelation with their crispy outer leaves and tender insides. When roasted to perfection, they offer a delightful combination of textures and flavors that can easily complement a variety of dishes, especially roast pork.

instructions.description: With a small knife, shave a thin slice off the base of the brussels sprouts. Cut them in half through the base.
Preheat the oven to 375Â°F. Pour the oil into a roasting pan large enough to hold the sprouts in a single layer. Add the sprouts, salt, and garlic. Toss well and turn the sprouts cut-side down.
Roast the sprouts, stirring once, 30 to 40 minutes, or until browned and tender. Serve hot.
